short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send Etsy Order Numbers to Fanmark

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fanmark is a tool that helps independent artists who create and sell on Etsy and other online retail shops. It enables the artist to use intellectual property owned by large corporations by managing the communication, relationships, and visibility.

Artists who use Fanmark agree to share their sales data from the retail platforms they use.

This plugin helps automate sharing of that sales data by finding it on Etsy and sending it to the artist's account in Fanmark using the Fanmark API.
